    • Method Detail

      • setChocoSettings

        public void setChocoSettings(org.chocosolver.solver.Settings chocoSettings)
        Configure the settings for the underlying SAT solver
        Parameters:
        chocoSettings - required

      • solve

        public java.util.Set<Attribute> solve()
        Returns:
        the set of solutions - answers to the question that satisfy a puzzle. The list will be empty if the puzzle contains contradicting rules or facts. Puzzles generated by QuestionPuzzleGenerator have a single solution and the collection will have a single element.

      • solveToStream

        public java.util.stream.Stream<Attribute> solveToStream()
        Returns:
        the stream of all solutions
        See Also:
        solve()

      • solveSingle

        public Attribute solveSingle()
        Returns:
        a single solution to the puzzle, useful for puzzles that were generated by QuestionPuzzleGenerator and are guaranteed to have a single solution
        Throws:
        java.util.NoSuchElementException - if the puzzle doesn't have any solutions
